description:
An affordable and reliable way to get your tires to the right pressure. The 6.3cm gauge ensures you get the pressure just right. As a bonus, you also get adapters for inflating your favorite beach accessories and your kids' basketballs, volleyballs or footballs.

  • Composite handle acts as a storage for the included ball needle set
  • 32mm steel barrel is large enough to pump your tires quickly
  • Composite base keeps the weight low
  • 6.3cm-wide pressure gauge is located near the top for easy reading
  • Pressure bleeder button at gauge allows you to remove some pressure if needed
  • Pump head fits Schrader and Presta valves
name: MEC Apex Floor Pump
